author: hufnagel
body:
Updates t0 spec to the latest version (which is actually used in prod). Want to finally switch production deployments to use the comp repository instead of my private one.

As the package isn't installed on cmsweb and currently no one uses the comp package this should be able to go in whenever (asap).

Question, when are the rpms actually available from the comp repository ? After the first HG1604 build ?
title: update t0 to 2.0.1
